query:
ALTER TABLE componentCalculations 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS tMinCodeReference VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mawpCodeReference VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS remainingLifeCodeReference VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS intermediateValues JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calculationTimestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calculationVersion VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calculatedBy VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calculationHash VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS allowableStressSource VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS allowableStressTableRef VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS jointEfficiencySource VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS jointEfficiencyCategory VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS jointEfficiencyType VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS jointEfficiencyExamination VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementUncertainty DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementMethod ENUM('ut_contact', 'ut_immersion', 'rt_derived', 'profile_gauge'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementInstrument VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementCalibrationDate DATE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS validationStatus ENUM('pending', 'validated', 'rejected', 'override') DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS validationNotes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS validationDate TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS validatedBy VARCHAR(255);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2vRv1t5JdAedAFZ.807c3fab4c80 --database A4XPjAmiHcgmrps2ZTa96H --execute ALTER TABLE componentCalculations 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS tMinCodeReference VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mawpCodeReference VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS remainingLifeCodeReference VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS intermediateValues JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calculationTimestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calculationVersion VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calculatedBy VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calculationHash VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS allowableStressSource VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS allowableStressTableRef VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS jointEfficiencySource VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS jointEfficiencyCategory VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS jointEfficiencyType VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS jointEfficiencyExamination VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementUncertainty DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementMethod ENUM('ut_contact', 'ut_immersion', 'rt_derived', 'profile_gauge'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementInstrument VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementCalibrationDate DATE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS validationStatus ENUM('pending', 'validated', 'rejected', 'override') DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS validationNotes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS validationDate TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS validatedBy VARCHAR(255);
